name: Ombre (ItsJustJord)
description:
Ombre

A short atmospheric horror game where  you play as a psychiatrist who has been requested to help one of his past patients this time he has done something terrible, see how much of the story you can uncover with just a few small bits of information.  

Help the psychiatrist search around the location, discover anything that could be hiding, and remember to watch out for anything that seems out of the ordinary. 

If you plan on covering the game on YouTube/Twitch feel free to do so, use the hashtag #OmbreGame so I can see it. 

Any donations are very much appreciated as it helps cover some of the costs for the assets.
